normal_single.input: Set the heating temperature in the guest bedroom to 26 degrees.
Set the fan speed of the air purifiers to auto in the master bedroom.
Increase the volume of the media player in the garage by 75%.
Increase the intensity of the aromatherapy in the living room by 5%.
Decrease the volume of the media player on the balcony by 29%.
Decrease the brightness of the light in the kitchen by 15 percent.
Increase the fan speed of the air conditioner in the master bedroom by 1 level.

unexist_device_single.input: Decrease the volume of the media player by 40% in the master bedroom.
Set the volume of the media player to 40 in the living room.
Adjust the curtain to 30 degrees in the guest bedroom.
Set the aromatherapy interval to 20 in the foyer.
Turn off the heating in the guest bedroom.

unexist_attribute_single.input: Set the brightness of the light to 80 in the kitchen.

normal_multi.input: Set the temperature to 17 degrees in the study room and adjust the volume to 100 on the media player in the balcony.

Increase the air conditioner temperature in the living room by 2 degrees, set the intensity of the aromatherapy in the foyer to 10%, and adjust the air conditioner temperature in the study room to 16 degrees.
Set the brightness of the light in the master bedroom to 10 and turn off the light in the garage.
Set the brightness of the light in the corridor to 40, adjust the water heater temperature in the kitchen to 85, and increase the intensity of the aromatherapy in the guest bedroom to 50.

mix_multi.input: Decrease the intensity of the dehumidifiers by 20% in the store room, set the air purifiers fan speed to high in the dining room, adjust the humidifier intensity to 30 in the master bedroom, set the brightness of the light to 100 in the guest bedroom, increase the intensity of the dehumidifiers by 73% in the living room, adjust the volume of the media player to 70 in the garage, set the volume of the media player to 50 on the balcony, set the heating fan speed to medium in the master bedroom, set the air conditioner temperature to 30 in the study room, and increase the air conditioner temperature by 4 degrees in the living room.

Increase the intensity of the dehumidifier by 59% in the guest bedroom, adjust the curtains in the study room to 10 degrees, increase the curtains in the living room by 80%, set the temperature of the water heater to 90 degrees in the kitchen, and adjust the air conditioner temperature to 30 degrees in the study room.

_comment: These inputs from subset_20_homebench_4-3-1-1-1.jsonl were converted to this categorized format after processing through the TaskCategorizer.load_and_categorize_dataset() method. Tasks are grouped by HomeBench evaluation categories for downstream processing.
